original: Christenson, Kjell Ivan, länsveterinär, Göteborg, f. 12/4/92 i Asmund-torp s :n, Malmöh. 1., av Chr. C. o. Elna Esbjörnson. G. 27 m. gymn:dir. Ingrid Palm. Barn: Kjell f. 28, Marianne 31. — Stud:ex. 12, stud. v. Lunds univ. 12-13, veterinärex. 18, länsveterinärkurs 28. Stud. v. veteri-närhögsk. i Brüssel 27, res. m. stats-stip. t. Estl, Lettl., Litauen, Polen o. Tyskl. 31. Bat :veterinär i Fvk res. sed. 21, distr :veterinär i Vindeln 20-24, distr:- o. stadsveterinär i Simrishamn 24-37, länsveterinär i Gbgs o. Boh. 1., karantäns- o. exp :besiktn :ve-terinär i Gbg sed. 38. V. sekr. i Sv. distr :veterinärfören. styr. 24-37, led. av div. komm. där, led. av epizooti-lagstiftn :sakk. i medicistyr. 29, led. av stadsfullm. i Simrishamn 32-35, led. av hälsov:ndn där 24-37, ordf. 32-36, led. av div. kommunala komm., ’sekr. i Sv. länsveterinärfören. 43-45. Skr.: Om husdjurskliniker v. veterinärstationerna i Sverige (35) samt en mängd vete-rinärvet:skapl. o. populära upps. i sv. o. skandinav, veterinärtidskr. samt i dagspressen, spec. i lantm :pressen 22-47. RV02kl 46, 0ffLitGed02kl 37, ERK03kl 43, Sv. veterinärläk :fören. SM 35, Revalis djurskyddisfören. för-tj:t.36.
translated: Christenson, Kjell Ivan, county veterinarian, Gothenburg, b. 12/4/92 in Asmundtorp parish, Malmöhus county, son of Chr. C. and Elna Esbjörnson. Married in 1927 to gymnasium director Ingrid Palm. Children: Kjell b. 1928, Marianne b. 1931. Completed secondary school education in 1912, studied at Lund University from 1912-1913, completed veterinary degree in 1918, completed county veterinarian course in 1928. Studied at the Veterinary High School in Brussels in 1927, and received government scholarship for study trips to Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, and Germany in 1931. Was a veterinary batman in the military reserves since 1921, district veterinarian in Vindeln from 1920-1924, district and city veterinarian in Simrishamn from 1924-1937, county veterinarian in Gothenburg and Bohus county, quarantine and export inspection veterinarian in Gothenburg since 1938. Vice secretary of the Swedish district veterinary association board from 1924-1937, member of various committees within the association, member of the epizootic legislation committee in the medical board in 1929, member of the city council in Simrishamn from 1932-1935, member of the health committee from 1924-1937, chairman from 1932-1936, member of various municipal committees, secretary of the Swedish county veterinary association from 1943-1945. Wrote about veterinary clinics at veterinary stations in Sweden (1935) as well as various veterinary scientific and popular articles in Swedish and Scandinavian veterinary journals and newspapers, particularly in agricultural newspapers from 1922-1947. Awards include RV02kl 46, 0ffLitGed02kl 37, ERK03kl 43. Member of the Swedish veterinary medical association, awarded SM 35, and named honoree of the Reval animal protection association in 1936.
